tool_description: Search for stocks with similar patterns
name: Search for similar stocks
title: Search for similar stocks

api_list.name: Get similar stocks (60 days)
api_list.description: Result is calculated based on last 60 trading days.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://search-for-similar-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "search-for-similar-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://search-for-similar-stocks.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "search-for-similar-stocks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
